name: Perona
text: On Play: Up to 2 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less cannot be rested until the end of your opponent's next turn. On K.O.: You may rest 1 of your cards: Play up to 1 green Character card with a cost of 5 or less from your hand.

effect.text: Up to 2 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less cannot be rested until the end of your opponent's next turn.
You may rest 1 of your cards: Play up to 1 green Character card with a cost of 5 or less from your hand.
